sec.p: Bentham Science ONLY accepts articles written in good English. A scientifically sound and grammatically correct article leaves a greater impact on the reader. Our copyeditors ensure the usage of correct grammar and spelling, consistent terminology and accurate punctuation.

list-item.p: Conforming to either British or American English
Improvement in language by opting for appropriate word choice
Correction of spelling, grammatical and punctuation errors
Editing of scientific, medical or technical content
Re-writing or paraphrasing of any part or of the complete manuscript
Formatting of manuscripts as per specific Journal guideline

sec.title: TYPES OF MANUSCRIPTS HANDLED:
sec.p: Bentham Science caters to manuscripts requiring both Minor and Moderate copyediting.

list-item.p: Minor Copyediting: Minor copyediting entails correction of spellings, punctuation, typographical errors and basic grammatical glitches.

Moderate copyediting: Moderate copyediting involves, besides typographical errors, correction of fundamental language errors mostly grammatical in nature, sentence clarity, redundancies and inconsistencies in the text of only linguistic nature.
Regular: 7 to 10 days depending on the type of editing required
Urgent: 3 to 5 days, depending on the type of editing required
